title: Sales & Business Developer - Norway
description:
**About Mynt**


Mynt is an all-in-one corporate card and spend management solution, on a mission to fundamentally change business banking forever. Our digital software, coupled with corporate cards and payments infrastructure, eradicates manual administrative tasks for businesses. Experiencing huge growth in the Swedish and Finnish markets, we have recently secured substantial funding to fuel our expansion both in Sweden and internationally.


Mynt is a tech-first company with a product oriented mindset, empowering team to be their best in ideating and creating innovative solutions to complex problems. In 2021, Mynt obtained financial license as an e-money institution, card issuer, and payment processor from the Swedish Financial Supervisory Authority.


Since 2022, we’ve launched several strategic partnerships, starting with Fortnox where we integrated corporate cards directly into their platform. In early 2023, we announced a similar partnership with Accountor Group in Finland. Since then, additional integrations have gone live — including Kleer and Wint. Additional partnerships are in progress and under development.


Joining Mynt means contributing to creating an exceptional product and company. We seek passionate individuals who thrive in a fast-paced environment, prioritizing customer value. With around 70 employees (and growing fast), we plan to further expand our team to support our growth.

**About the role**


We’re growing – and now we’re building a brand-new sales team in Norway!


Mynt is looking for driven and curious **Sales & Business Developers** to join our journey as we expand into the Norwegian market. This is a great opportunity to be part of establishing our local presence and building something from the ground up, as we introduce our modern financial platform to a new audience.


In this role, you’ll be part of our first local sales team in **Norway** – a unique opportunity to help shape how we grow in a new market. You’ll spend your time engaging with decision-makers like CEOs and CFOs, helping them understand how Mynt can simplify financial processes and support smarter growth.
  

  

You’ll manage the full sales cycle – from prospecting and outreach to closing deals and building long-term relationships. Whether it’s through cold calls, emails, LinkedIn, or meetings, you’ll take initiative to open doors and lead consultative sales conversations with clarity and confidence. Beyond the sales process, you’ll represent Mynt in the Norwegian market – acting as a trusted advisor and a true ambassador for our brand.


You’ll be based at our new office in **Oslo**, and work closely with colleagues both locally and at our HQ in Stockholm. We offer a collaborative and supportive environment where you’ll play an important role in shaping our presence in a new market and making a real impact from day one.


If you enjoy working in a fast-paced, hands-on environment and want to be part of building something from the ground up – we’d love to hear from you.

**What you’ll be up to:**

* Complete all aspects of the business development cycle, including prospecting/cold calls, discovery, presentation, proposal creation, contract negotiation and relationship development
* Proactively seek new business opportunities through cold calls, emails and LinkedIn to set up meetings in the Norwegian market
* Secure appointments with mid-level and C-Level execs and conduct a well-defined, consultative sales process
* Take ownership, being a Mynt ambassadeur and represent Mynt in the Norwegian market

**What you bring to the table:**

* Proven experience of B2B sales, specifically within the Norwegian market
* Strong customer orientation and successful negotiation skills
* Proven, creative and results-driven closer to win business at C-Level
* Have experience from a startup environment and are comfortable working within a fast paced environment
* Highly effective and professional communication skills in written and verbal communication
* Fluent in Norwegian and English

**What we can offer you:**

* Be part of an amazing team in a fast-growing scale-up.
* Collaborate with fun, driven colleagues – both locally and across our Stockholm HQ.
* Enjoy a flexible work environment and a centrally located office in Norway.
* Shape your own development and responsibilities based on your passion and interest.

*The position will be filled as soon as we find a suitable candidate. Please reach out to us as soon as possible if you believe this for you!*

title: Erfaren utvecklare
description:
*Är du en erfaren utvecklare som drivs av att leverera vassa mjukvarulösningar som förenklar kunders vardag? Är du prestigelös och vill jobba med likasinnade kollegor som värdesätter kunskapsdelning och att ha roligt på jobbet? Då kommer du gilla oss på Softhouse!*

 **Om Softhouse**  



På Softhouse är vi ca. 300 medarbetare fördelade över 10 kontor, där vi tillsammans levererar tjänster och mjukvara i världsklass. I region Sydost hittar du oss på våra kontor i Karlskrona och Karlshamn, där vi är ett sammansvetsat team på ca 65 kollegor. Här arbetar vi i olika kunduppdrag och teamleveranser, både från våra egna kontor och on-site hos kund. Vi värdesätter kunskapsdelning och tycker om att umgås tillsammans både på jobbet och utanför, på aws, träning, brädspelskvällar, årlig kräftskiva, konferens- och skidresa.

**Vad vi erbjuder**

Hos oss blir du en del av ett framåtsträvande bolag med korta beslutsvägar och högt i tak. Vi är alla prestigelösa teamspelare som drivs av att leverera produkter, tjänster och mjukvara av högsta kvalitet. Och, förutom kollegor i världsklass och garanterat roligt på jobbet, erbjuder vi även:

* Möjlighet att **utmanas tekniskt** **med kompetenta kollegor** i en mix av kunduppdrag och leveransmodeller.
* **Individuellt anpassad kompetensutveckling** och **aktiv kunskapsdelning** med andra kollegor, både lokalt och över kontoren.
* En given plats i **ett tight team som gillar att ha roligt tillsammans** på jobbet, varje dag.
* **Ett värderingsstyrt bolag** där vi alla känner igen oss i våra värdeord: *Team, Enkelhet, Mod och Passion.*

  

**Vad vi letar efter hos dig**

För oss handlar senioritet inte bara om antal års erfarenhet. Det handlar om fallenheten att vara en förtroendeingivande relationsskapare med kunder och kollegor. Förmågan att ta sig an varierande roller, eller ledarhatten i ett projekt om så behövs. Lyhördhet för kundens behov och ett driv att erbjuda bästa möjliga mjukvarulösning. Viljan att söka förbättring, lyfta teamet runt dig och hjälpa juniora kollegor att växa och lyckas.


Du fattar, senioritet kan innebära många saker - men mer specifikt, för att lyckas i rollen ser vi gärna att du:

* Har omfattande erfarenhet av programmering och kompetens inom t.ex. Java, .NET/C#, Kotlin, Node.js, React eller Vue.
* Är van vid att bidra i mjukvaruutvecklingens alla faser som kravställning, arkitektur, design, test och integration.
* Trivs med att jobba enligt agila principer och metoder.
* Har en högskole-/universitetsexamen inom relevant område.
* Kan uttrycka dig obehindrat på svenska och engelska.

  

*Låter det intressant?* *Det är precis lika viktigt att vi passar för dig, som att du passar för oss.* *Vi ser fram emot att ta del av din ansökan och lära känna dig bättre!*

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
*Här får du arbeta med långsiktig produktutveckling tillsammans med kompetenta och seniora kollegor. Vi lägger stort fokus på din utveckling och du får en skräddarsydd utvecklingsplan som passar dig och dina personliga mål. Vi arbetar dessutom utifrån en hybrid arbetsmodell där det finns stort utrymme för flexibilitet. Välkommen till oss på CAB!*  



**Om tjänsten**
---------------


Nu erbjuder vi en utvecklande roll som Software Developer för vår produkt MEPS. I MEPS samarbetar fastighetsbolag, försäkringsbolag och entreprenörer kring uppdrag som rör ROT och reparation i fastigheter, på ett effektivt, transparent och lönsamt sätt. En del av ditt uppdrag i den här tjänsten kommer innebära att du får jobba med att skapa hållbara tekniska lösningar genom automatiserade bygg- och deployprocesser där du kommer ha koll på prestandan och övervakning av stödfunktioner.

**Att vara utvecklare på CAB**
------------------------------


På CAB arbetar vi enligt DevOps och CI/CD eftersom vi tycker att det är viktigt att våra utvecklingsteam får följa resultatet av de produkter de arbetar med, över tid. Som utvecklare är du alltså delaktig i hela utvecklingskedjan, från kravställning och design till färdig produkt. Varje team består av utvecklare som jobbar både backend och fronted, scrum master, lead developer och testare.


Dessutom är vi väldigt förtjusta i att arbeta med teknik i framkant och har en Microsoftbaserad utvecklingsmiljö där vi bland annat använder:

* .NET, C#, Javascript och SQL
* Webbramverken Blazor och Angular.
* Azure Pipelines


Azure är vår primära driftmiljö där vi strävar mot mikrotjänstarkitektur, containers och eventbaserade lösningar. Vi jobbar även med Infrastructure as Code vilket är ett sätt att hantera och distribuera infrastruktur genom kod istället för manuella processer.


I dagsläget är vi mer än 100 medarbetare som arbetar inhouse i våra utvecklingsteam på kontoren i Örebro, Göteborg och Oslo.


**När du utvecklas, utvecklas vi!**
-----------------------------------


Självklart är det även viktigt att du får tid att utvecklas och ta dig an ny kunskap, därför lägger vi stort fokus på din kompetensutveckling. Vi tror det mesta kommer ske i det dagliga arbetet där du omges av kompetenta och ambitiösa kollegor som gärna delar med sig av sin kunskap och som vill lära sig av dig.


Detta sker genom bland annat:

* Regelbundna Lab Days där du helt fritt kan välja tekniker, plattformar eller metoder att fördjupa dig inom.
* Kompetensutveckling via utvecklarkonferenser eller liknande forum.

CAB Tech Talk - en seminarieserie där du som utvecklare har möjlighet att dela kunskap, den senaste tekniken eller utvecklingslösningar med dina kollegor.  
* 

Detta i kombination med en bred produktportfölj skapar förutsättningar för många utvecklingsmöjligheter.


**Klicka här och läs mer om vårt förmånspaket och hur vi strävar efter att alltid vara en riktigt bra arbetsplats!**

**Är du den vi söker?**
-----------------------


Vi tror du drivs av att effektivisera arbetsflöden och skapa hållbara tekniska lösningar genom automatiserade bygg- och deployprocesser, samt standardiserade mönster och designprinciper som gör det enkelt att vidareutveckla vår mjukvara. Du gillar att ligga steget före och skapa förutsättningar för ett starkt och produktivt utvecklingsteam. Du får gärna ha praktisk erfarenhet Azure Pipelines eller liknande.


För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du tycker om att ta dig an ny teknik men även dela med dig och bidra till utvecklingen i teamet. Eftersom du arbetar genom hela livscykeln av de produkter du är med och utvecklar så är helhetsperspektiv och ansvarstagande något som känns självklart för dig.  

  



**Låter det som något för dig? Tveka inte att söka redan idag!**

  

På CAB vill vi ta tillvara de kvalitéer som mångfald tillför verksamheten och välkomnar därför en bredd av sökande till tjänsten. I vår kompetensbaserade rekryteringsprocess tror vi på devisen ”hire for attitude”. Det är viktigt för oss att veta att du är motiverad och engagerad i ditt arbete samt vad du kan åstadkomma här och nu- och även i framtiden. Kanske knockar du oss med ett ess i rockärmen!

***Urval sker löpande men annonsen är öppen till 11/6.***


Har du frågor kring tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Julia Lindmark, tfn 070-615 84 06 eller julia.lindmark@cab.se.


I alla våra rekryteringar genomför vi bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidat.

title: Senior software developer
description:
#### **Utvec****kla framtiden med oss!**

  

Vill du vara med att säkra digitaliseringen för våra kunder inom läkemedel, hälsa och sjukvård? Vill du samtidigt jobba nära hemmaplan – i ett team med vassa och snälla kollegor? Då kan du vara den vi söker till vårt växande kontor i Uppsala!

**Är du den vi söker?**


Vi söker dig som är engagerad, ansvarstagande, vill vara en del av det agila laget och som alltid vill fortsätta att utvecklas.


I denna roll blir du en viktig spelare i vårt team och vi tror därför att du är en teamspelare med högt ansvarstagande och kvalitétstänk. Du trivs i kundrelationerna där du är en både strukturerad och engagerad rådgivare och har förmåga att omsätta dina kunskaper i konkreta lösningar. Du är van att agera självständigt och inte rädd för att ta egna initiativ.


Vi tror också att du är öppen, positiv och gillar att arbeta i en miljö där kunskap delas generöst – en plats där vi ständigt utvecklas tillsammans.

**För den här tjänsten söker vi dig som**

* har 5+ års erfarenhet av programmering inom .NET eller Java.
* har akademisk utbildning inom systemutveckling eller motsvarande
* behärskar svenska och engelska obehindrat i tal och skrift

*Har du dessutom jobbat med IT kopplat till läkemedel, hälso- och sjukvård, Life Science eller cybersäker digitalisering så är det ett stort plus i kanten.*

### **Om oss**


Omegapoint grundades 2001 och är idag Norra Europas ledande konsultbolag inom cybersäker digitalisering. Vår vision är en framtid där vi kan lita fullt ut på tekniken – därför använder vi vår expertis för att säkra både våra kunders och medarbetares utveckling.


Vi är både vassa och snälla, något som präglar hela vår kultur. Hos oss är kunskapsdelning en självklarhet och kompetensutveckling mer än bara ett löfte – det är en del av vår vardag.


Idag är vi över 900 konsulter, verksamma i Stockholm, Oslo, Drammen, Köpenhamn, Göteborg, Malmö, Örebro, Västerås, Enköping, Uppsala och Umeå.

##### **Vi satsar på dig**


Hos Omegapoint står din utveckling i centrum. Vi erbjuder dig en varierad vardag med spännande uppdrag, samtidigt som du har ett tryggt och välkomnande kontor i centrala Uppsala att komma hem till.


Här skapar vi gemenskap genom kunskap. Året igenom ordnar vi aktiviteter och event som stärker både kompetensen och teamkänslan och varje år samlas vi för våra omtalade kompetenskonferenser.


Du blir en del av ett lag där vi stöttar, utmanar och lyfter varandra. Vi tror på att dela med sig av kunskap, erfarenheter och engagemang och vi vill att alla ska få bästa möjliga förutsättningar att lyckas.


Vi vågar lova dig en arbetsplats där du både trivs, utvecklas och får möjlighet att forma en ljus framtid – för dig själv och för andra.

**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

  

Vi hoppas att du vill bli en av oss och ser fram emot din ansökan. Maila oss om du har några frågor eller vill veta mer: uppsala-jobb@omegapoint.se  

  



Läs mer om oss på: omegapoint.se/uppsala  

Fler lediga jobb finns på: jobb.omegapoint.se/jobs

title: Embedded Software Developer with CAN-bus experience
description:
Are you passionate about embedded systems and eager to see your work drive innovation in heavy machinery worldwide? Join our expanding development team and help shape the future of earthmoving efficiency together with Steelwrist!

**What You’ll Do**


As an Embedded Software Developer, you’ll play a vital role in integrating our advanced in-house developed control systems - used in tiltrotators and work tools - directly with excavator CAN-bus networks of our . Your expertise will help boost efficiency and productivity for operators and OEM partners across the globe.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop, integrate, and optimize embedded real-time software for our control system platform, including joystick grips, hydraulic valve controllers, and connectivity modules.
* Collaborate closely with international customers and OEMs, ensuring seamless integration into excavator CAN-bus networks.
* Conduct onsite testing, debugging, and customer support across Europe and Asia.
* Work side-by-side with our Rosersberg-based development team and our sister company SVAB’s software engineers in Åsbro.

**What We’re Looking For:**


To thrive in this role, you’ll need:

* Embedded C/C++ Mastery: Proven experience developing embedded software on RTOS platforms (ARM and PIC), from system design to release.
* CAN Protocol Expertise: Deep understanding of CANopen and J1939 (SPNs, PGNs, DM1 diagnostics) and hands-on experience with CAN network integration.
* Testing & Debugging Skills: Strong background in vehicle-level integration testing, CAN diagnostics, and analysis of logged CAN data.
* Modern Toolset: Proficiency with version control (Git, SVN), debugging tools, and functional safety best practices.
* Lab Savvy: Skilled with electronic lab equipment—oscilloscopes, signal generators, and more.

**Who You Are?**


You’re a proactive problem solver with excellent communication skills and a collaborative spirit. You enjoy hands-on work, international teamwork, and seeing your solutions make a real-world impact.

title: Frontendutvecklare
description:
Som senior frontendutvecklare hos oss blir du en nyckelspelare i våra kundprojekt, där din förmåga att **balansera expertuppdrag och teamleveranser** är avgörande. Ibland är du den tekniska experten som driver specialiserade uppdrag på egen hand, och ibland är du en del av ett större team där ni tillsammans skapar lösningar som gör skillnad.
  

  

**Om rollen:**

* **Utveckla moderna frontendlösningar** med fokus på användarupplevelse, prestanda och skalbarhet.
* I **expertuppdrag** ta ansvar för att navigera tekniska utmaningar, leda arbetet och skapa förtroende hos kunden.
* I **teamleveranser** samarbeta tätt med designers, UX:are, backendutvecklare och projektledare för att skapa helhetslösningar som är både funktionella och visuellt tilltalande.
* Bidra till en kultur av **kunskapsdelning**, där du mentorstöttar juniora kollegor och hjälper teamet att växa.
* Vara med och **driva tekniska strategier** samt utveckla processer som lyfter vårt erbjudande till nästa nivå.
  

**Vem är du?**

  

* Har **5 års erfarenhet** av frontendutveckling i komplexa projekt.
* Har gedigen erfarenhet av moderna ramverk som **React, Next.js eller Angular** samt cloudlösningar som **Azure.**
* Starka kunskaper i **JavaScript** och **TypeScript**, inklusive bästa praxis för kodstruktur, typning och underhåll.
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla tillgängliga webbplatser i enlighet med **WCAG-riktlinjer**, med fokus på att skapa inkluderande lösningar för alla användare
* Har erfarenhet av versionshantering med **Git** och en DevOps-vänlig arbetsmetodik.
* Är van att arbeta agilt i team och förstår vikten av samarbete och kommunikation.

**Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:**

* Docker.
* Optimizely Commerce Cloud/Content Cloud (Episerver Commerce/CMS), Litium, Umbraco eller inRiver PIM – men huvudsaken är att du har ett brinnande intresse och vill lära dig mer inom området!
* Testdriven utveckling (TDD) och verktyg som Jest eller Cypress.
* Webpack, vite och andra byggverktyg.
  

**Varför Knowit Experience?**


Hos oss är medarbetaren i centrum. Vi erbjuder en inkluderande och kreativ miljö där din utveckling står i fokus. Du kommer få möjlighet att arbeta med många spännande kunder och projekt, samtidigt som vi värdesätter balansen mellan arbete och privatliv.


Vi tror på en kultur av samarbete, öppenhet och ständig förbättring. Din röst spelar roll, och vi uppmuntrar dig att bidra till vår gemensamma framgång.

**Ansökan**


Låter detta som du? Då vill vi gärna höra från dig! Har du frågor om rollen eller om oss på Knowit? Tveka inte att kontakta **S****andra Skilberg** eller **Caroline Almqvist**.


Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!

title: Backendutvecklare
description:
Är du en backendutvecklare med några års erfarenhet som trivs med att leda tekniskt komplexa projekt och kreativa lösningsprocesser? Vill du ta helhetsansvar för utvecklingsarbete och coacha mindre erfarna kollegor? Hos Knowit Experience får du möjligheten att utveckla innovativa och hållbara lösningar, samtidigt som du bygger starka, långsiktiga relationer med våra kunder.

### **Om rollen**


Som backendutvecklare hos oss kommer du att:

  

* Vara aktiv i kreativa lösningsprocesser och samarbeta med andra seniora utvecklare för att säkerställa hög kvalitet i större projekt.
* Kvalitetssäkra leveranser och stötta mindre erfarna kollegor.
* Estimera och argumentera för hela lösningar samt förklara dessa för både tekniska och icke-tekniska parter.
* Hantera tekniska uppgifter som installation, produktionssättning och infrastrukturkonfigurationer.
* Dokumentera lösningar på ett fullständigt och tydligt sätt.

### **Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig med hög teknisk kompetens och erfarenhet av att arbeta med projekt från början till slut. Du har djupa kunskaper inom metodiker, arkitekturmönster och infrastruktur samt är van att ta fram lösningsförslag och leda produktionssättningar.


Vi tror att du har ca 5 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling, gärna i rollen som konsult eller på byrå där du deltagit i olika kundprojekt inom flera branscher. Du har erfarenhet av tekniker som:

* **C#, .NET**
* **Azure** (t.ex. Azure Storage, Azure Service Bus och Azure Search)
* **Microservices**
* **CMS** (Umbraco/Optimizely)
* **GraphQL**
* **Git, Bitbucket, DevOps, Jira**
  


Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet av tekniker som **Continuous Integration & Continuous Delivery** samt **Docker & Kubernetes.**  

  

Som person är du initiativtagande och trivs med att samarbeta i både små och stora team. Du uppskattar kreativa problemlösningar, tar dig gärna an utmaningar – stora som små – och strävar efter att ständigt förbättra både din egen och teamets kodkvalitet.

### **Vad vi erbjuder**


Hos oss får du:

* Möjlighet att arbeta både inhouse och i expertuppdrag med ett tight, agilt och tvärfunktionellt team.
* En roll där du kan växa och skapa din framtid i en miljö som värdesätter initiativ och kompetensutveckling.
* Möjlighet att leda helhetsåtaganden inom webb och e-handel och utveckla långsiktiga partnerskap med våra kunder.
* Tillgång till ett inspirerande nätverk med närmare 350 kollegor inom Experience.
* En trygg anställning med kollektivavtal, generösa och proaktiva hälso- och friskvårdsupplägg samt pensions- och försäkringsförmåner.
* En arbetsplats som värdesätter balans mellan arbete och fritid samt aktivt arbetar med jämställdhet, miljö och hållbarhet.
* **Ansökan**
* Låter detta som du? Då vill vi gärna höra från dig! Har du frågor om rollen eller om oss på Knowit? Tveka inte att kontakta **S****andra Skilberg** eller **Caroline Almqvist**.
* Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!

title: C++ developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**  

* Work on the game edition to develop the systems that drive Ore UI, using C++
* Collaborating with C++ developers and TypeScript/React developers on building new UI and making API decisions.
* Work with designer and producer to solve user needs.
* Maintain integration between our game and top of the line 3rd party UI technology.
* Collaborate with other teams to drive UI cohesion throughout the game.
* Improve ways of working and technical best practices within the team.
* Coach members within and outside of the team on best practices in software development.
* Balance performance, user experience and developer experience in every decision.
* Ensure high levels of quality, for example by utilizing good API design and test automation.
  

  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

* Proficiency with C++ (C++17 and C++20).
* Experience working with legacy code.
* Understanding of and interest in rendering and how graphics implementations are made.
* Strong communication and problem-solving skills, as well as a natural collaborator and team player.
* Passion for supporting and understanding how the product teams using Ore UI can work efficiently with the framework we provide for them.

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 28-05-2025  

  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!  


  



**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Software Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**Join Us in Shaping the Future of Connectivity!**  

  

Are you passionate about state-of-art technology and want to play a crucial role in developing the networks that makes remote healthcare, smart cities, and autonomous vehicles a reality? Here at Ericsson, we are not just imagining the future, we’re building it!  

  

**About the Opportunity:**  

We are on a mission to develop 5G and beyond, creating telecom solutions that empower billions of people worldwide. Our team consists of highly dedicated, autonomous, and self-motivated engineers who thrive in an environment of collaboration and creativity. Located in our lively office at Lindholmen in Göteborg, with a stunning view of the Göta Älv river, we blend technical expertise with a dedication to improving the world.

 **What You Will Do:**  

We are currently looking for a Software Developer to join our cross - functional team and contribute to making our world-class telecom products even better. This is your chance to work on something meaningful and be part of a high-impact, fast-paced, and innovative department. In this role you will take ownership for feature development, from initial study through to implementation, testing, and delivery. Together with the team, you’ll collaborate to challenge the status quo, and dive into advanced software engineering challenges, aiming to set new world records in mobile packet switching.  

  

**What You Bring:**

* Education: BSc or MSc in Computer Science (or equivalent experience).
* 3+ years experience from C programming for product development.
* Experience from working with Packet Core and IP protocols.
* A passion for software development, solving challenging problems and digging into complex issues and finding innovative solutions.

 **Meritorious qualifications that we will be looking for:**

* Experience from Linux-based development environment, Jenkins.
* Experience from cloud & containers: Docker, Kubernetes, GCP, Amazon EKS, OpenStack, VMware.
* Networking: L2/L3 protocols, VPN, 3GPP standards, TCP, UDP, L2TP, TLS.
* Familiarity with using Golang for function testing. And Java and Python for system testing.

 **Why Join Us?**

* **Challenge Yourself:** Work on complex, high-performance systems that forces you to learn new skills and push your knowledge to the limit by continuous learning.
* **Make a Global Impact:** Your work will influence millions of users and create new possibilities for how people live and work.
* **Working in a transformation unit:** We are in the forefront of change, and you will be exposed and great minds and projects.
* **Be Part of a Visionary Team:** Collaborate with some of the best software developers in Sweden on projects that make a real difference, setting industry standards for network speed and low latency.
**Why join Ericsson?**
----------------------



At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

What happens once you apply? · Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.

**Last Application: 5/6- 2025**

 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Göteborg

title: Dotnet Developer
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Vi söker .NET-utvecklare till Stockholm, Malmö, Östersund och Göteborg! 💻** 




 Vill du vara en del av ett av Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare och hjälpa våra kunder att ta nästa steg i sin digitala resa? Sopra Steria söker fler .NET-utvecklare till våra agila team – här möts trygghet, flexibilitet och en kultur präglad av kunskapsdelning. Vi kallar det
 *Power of Sharing* 
 !
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som .NET-utvecklare hos oss kommer du att bli en viktig del av våra kunders digitala transformation. Du arbetar nära både kunder och kollegor för att utveckla innovativa och affärskritiska lösningar. Våra projekt sträcker sig över flera branscher, bland annat telekom och offentlig sektor, där vi har stora behov av agila teamleveranser.
 



  





 Du får chansen att arbeta med modern teknik tillsammans med erfarna utvecklare och vara med och forma lösningar som gör skillnad i samhället. På Sopra Steria möts du av en stark teamkänsla och en kultur där kunskapsspridning och samarbete är centrala – något vi tror är nyckeln till både personlig och gemensam framgång. Läs gärna mer om oss och hur vi tänker här: klick!
 



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 



* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av .NET-utveckling.
* Har du dessutom erfarenhet av JavaScript, Azure eller mikrotjänster, vore det toppen!
* Trivs med att arbeta som konsult och gillar att dela kunskap med kollegor.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.



  





**Varför Sopra Steria?** 




 Hos oss får du arbeta med teknik i framkant tillsammans med engagerade kollegor. Vi erbjuder spännande och varierande uppdrag där du kan påverka projekt som gör skillnad i samhället. Med kollektivavtal, marknadsmässiga löner, flexibilitet och en kultur präglad av delning och samarbete vill vi ge dig den bästa arbetsmiljön för att lyckas.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Vill du bli en del av vårt .NET-team? Ansök enkelt genom att ladda upp ditt CV på vår hemsida. Har du frågor om tjänsten? Kontakta vår rekryterare Hanna Korell på
 **hanna.korell@soprasteria.com** 
 .
 



 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande – skicka därför in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Back End Developer (in-house)
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Software Development
description:
**COME WORK WITH US** 




 Netlight strives to be a truly diverse, equitable and inclusive organization. Regardless of who you are, what personality, background, and experience you have, you enrich our culture through your values. Netlight’s purpose is to unleash full potential, realize great careers, and fulfill personal growth. To achieve this, we have a highly engaged network organization, where every employee gets a mentor, delivery coach and personal communities. The key to our continued success is trust and personal responsibility, diverse experiences, challenging opportunities and developing from personal values. Every Netlighter is an active part of building and shaping this culture, which leads to a clear correlation between personal growth and the growth of Netlight.
 



  





**ABOUT US** 




 Netlight provides a full range of premium IT-consulting services at the forefront of the digital industry and stands out for its product- and technology-independent expertise in a wide range of industries and clients. We are a network organization of more than 2 000 role models making aspiring digital leaders successful in their business-critical IT projects. Netlight has been awarded several times as top employer, as well as for growth, continued profitability and engagement for diversity, equity and equality within the IT industry. Today we are growing all across Europe, currently with more than 10 active international offices.
 



  





**YOUR ROLE** 




 As a part of one of our agile teams, you will be a vital member of our internal tech organization. You will work in a tight-knit team, with the goal of enabling employees at Netlight to innovate, contribute to the technical landscape and being a part of the digitalization of the company.
 



  





 You will be part of evolving Netlight’s internal developer platform. You will provide and improve a solid API to support various custom application projects, set up guidelines, make suitable adjustments and improvements related to the platform, and share experiences and guidance with other Netlight employees.
 



  





 The main languages and technologies that you will encounter are Kotlin, Typescript, SQL and AWS.
 



  





 As we are a network organization, it is crucial that you are self-driven, comfortable with taking initiative and responsibility, as well as being a service-minded and a communicative team player. Curiosity and a willingness to try new things to expand your knowledge and experiences are important, as you will be in an evolving environment. Passion and a great interest for technology will be a strong foundation to grow upon.
 



  





**QUALIFICATIONS** 




 · Based in Stockholm
 



 · Higher education related to computer science or engineering
 



 · At least 2-3 years of professional experience
 



 · Written and spoken business level fluency in English
 



 · Proficient in: Kotlin and Typescript
 



 · Bonus skills:
 
 Backstage.io
 
 , Springboot, React, SQL, AWS
 



 · Self-driven yet networking, having a strong inner drive with a great ability to cooperate
 



 · Comfortable with taking responsibility and working in a team with high autonomy
 



 · A passion for development, and understanding the whole chain, from backend to end user
 



 · A good communicator, naturally building trust
 



 · Structured yet adaptive, taking responsibility for a dynamic learning environment
 



  





**WHAT WE OFFER** 




 We care for our colleagues and have a strong focus on our employees. We take great pride in facilitating personal and professional development. Along the way, we appreciate fun and social gatherings, in a young environment with flat structure and high ceilings. There is a lot of activity also after working hours, with extensive knowledge sharing, social events and spectacular conferences twice a year. Where Netlighters meet, Netlight happens!
 



  





**DON’T BE SHY – GET IN TOUCH WITH US!** 




 Should your experience and education match, we will get back to you within two weeks after your application.

title: Software Developer 4
description:
**Job Description**
 This global team is responsible for the Java Core Libraries, which include such areas as Networking (HTTP, URI, etc), Files / NIO, Collections, Compression (ZIP/JAR), Math, Serialization, Regular Expressions, XML, Internationalization (I18n), Charsets, Concurrency, & Classloaders. We are responsible for both new features as well as ongoing maintenance. We are looking for a software engineer to join our team of professionals, working with industry elites to take Java to the next level.
   

  

 Job Description:
   

  

 Senior Software Engineer, Core Libraries Team. We are in the process of starting up many new exciting projects to improve existing JDK releases and for upcoming JDK feature releases, with projects ranging from libraries support for proposed major new industry standards to supporting and/or leveraging the latest Java features from projects Amber, Loom, Panama, & Valhalla.
   

  

 Additional job responsibilities include working with external developers on the Open JDK, customers, and partners on defects and feature enhancement requests for future releases.
   

  

 Requirements:
   

  

* B.S. or above, Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent degree.
* 15+ years industry experience
* Experience with API design, code development, and debugging in multi-platform environments (Solaris, Windows, Linux, Mac) a plus
* Strong on data structures, algorithms, performance tuning, threading and concurrency.
* Strong on quality, including developing thorough tests for new or changed code.
* Hands-on experience in distributed computing, concurrency programming, performance enhancements in a server environment, algorithm design and implementation.
* Experience designing and maintaining low-level system libraries a plus
* Experience scaling networking based applications a plus
* Familiarity with Java and scripting languages (shell, python, perl, etc).
* Familiarity with test automation tools and practices (unit and system level automation).
* Design, develop, troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks etc.
* Solid written and oral communication skills.


 As a member of the software engineering division, you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems. Provide technical leadership to other software developers. Specify, design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needs.
   

  

 Duties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment. Fully competent in own area of expertise. May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel. BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area.
   

  

 Career Level - IC4
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a member of the software engineering division, you will take an active role in the definition and evolution of standard practices and procedures. You will be responsible for defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, designing and debugging of software applications or operating systems.
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation-request\_mb@oracle.com or by calling +1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Freelance Software Developer (PHP) - AI Tutor
description:
At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.
   

  

**What We Do**
 The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Coding, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.
   

  

 Although every project is unique, you might typically:
   

  

* Generate prompts that challenge AI
* Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers
* Correct the model's responses based on your domain-specific knowledge


**How To Get Started**
 Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.
   

  

**Requirements**
* You have a Master's degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields.
* You have at least 3 years of professional experience with PHP
* Code review experience is a must
* Experience with AI projects is a plus
* Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
* You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Benefits**
**Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
* Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
* Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

title: Software Developer (Consultant)
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**Come work with us** 




 Netlight strives to be a truly diverse, equitable and inclusive organization. Regardless of who you are, what personality, background, and experience you have, you enrich our culture through your values. Netlight’s purpose is to unleash full potential, realize great careers, and fulfill personal growth. To achieve this, we have a highly engaged network organization, where every employee gets a mentor, delivery coach and personal communities. The key to our continued success is trust and personal responsibility, diverse experiences, challenging opportunities and developing from personal values. Every Netlighter is an active part of building and shaping this culture, which leads to a clear correlation between personal growth and the growth of Netlight.
 



  





**About us** 




 Netlight provides a full range of premium IT-consulting services at the forefront of the digital industry and stands out for its product- and technology-independent expertise in a wide range of industries and clients. We are a network organization of more than 2 000 role models making aspiring digital leaders successful in their business-critical IT projects. Netlight has been awarded several times as top employer, as well as for growth, continued profitability and engagement for diversity, equity and equality within the IT industry. Today we are growing all across Europe, currently with more than 10 active international offices.
 



  





**What does it mean to be an IT Consultant in Software Development at Netlight?** 




 It will vary a lot between Netlighters as we, around the right person, will design a role together with you. You will be starting somewhere familiar. For example in web development? System development? Mobile Development? Data engineering? It is your call how your career at Netlight will look, ranging from which clients you will work with, what role you want to take (based on your personal experience, strengths, your personal interest) and how your relationship with your mentor/coach/EDGE networks/social networks will look like.
 



  





 As a consultant at Netlight, you will build the products, systems and technical solutions of today and tomorrow. This means that our consultants get the opportunity to help build and scale existing and new products and companies and also continuously learn and master a variety of technical tools. At Netlight, we will challenge you. Our clients will challenge you. You will challenge our clients. You will challenge us. We will grow together and unleash the potential in each other.
 



  





 Our projects are in the fields such as Backend Development, Frontend Development, Web Development, System Development, Cloud, Mobile Development, Architecture, Business Intelligence, Data Engineering, Data Science, DevOps, Infrastructure, Cyber Security, Scrum Master, Agile Coaching, Product Owner, UX-/UI-/Interaction Design and more.
 



  





**Minimum Qualifications** 



* Master Degree in Engineering
* Verbal and written fluency in English
* 0,5-5 years of work experience related to IT (if you are a graduate, see our other active job ad)



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Master Degree in Engineering or Technology
* Proven Track-record from previous positions (e.g. recognized achievements & deliveries)
* Advanced/Bilingual (B2-C2) Swedish/Norwegian/Danish



  





**Application** 




 We are always looking for new Netlighters, so feel free to apply if you meet the qualifications.
 



  





 We will get in touch within two weeks if we find that your profile and experiences are a match beyond the qualifications at this time.

title: Fullstack-utvecklare
description:
Är du en erfaren Fullstack-utvecklare som är redo för nya utmaningar? Vi letar efter dig som är redo att kliva ombord på vår tillväxtresa i ett nytt bolag inom mjukvara, Embedded-system och IT. Välkommen till ett företag där vi bygger framtidens lösningar.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Vi är inte som alla andra. Vi är Sigma Industry East North – en del av en prisbelönt koncern med hjärtat på rätt ställe och siktet inställt på både roligheter och kvalitet. Nu har vi startat ett helt nytt bolag med säte i Liljeholmen, där fokus är mjukvara och Embedded-system. Med oss får du möjligheten att vara med och bygga upp ett nytt företag från grunden, med allt vad det innebär av spännande utmaningar och möjligheter.
   

  

 GRUNDLÄGGANDE KVALIFIKATIONER
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har en bakgrund inom mjukvaruutveckling och har en stark vilja att utveckla både dig själv och andra, men framför allt leverera inom ditt gebit. Du är van vid att arbeta i agila projektmiljöer och har erfarenhet av att utveckla och implementera digitala lösningar i olika branscher. Du är kommunikativ, lösningsorienterad och trivs i en roll där du får kombinera djup teknisk kompetens med praktiskt ingenjörsarbete.
   

  

 MERITERANDE FÄRDIGHETER, EGENSKAPER OCH ERFARENHETER
   

  

**Kompetenskrav:** 
  

  

  

* Minst 5-8 års erfarenhet av Fullstack-programmering. :
+ Back-end i språk som Java, C# .Net, Python eller Node.js
+ Front-End i språk som Javascript, Typescript, CSS, och HTML

* Erfarenhet av olika ramverk som t ex React, Angular, Vue, SpringBoot etc.
* Erfarenhet av agila metoder (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe)
* Hänger bekvämt i databaser (SQL, Oracle, Mongo DB) och i molnet (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Erfarenhet av Deployment och DevOps (exempelvis Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Terraform)
* Smidig i att balansera smart teknik med användarvänliga gränssnitt
* Behärskar svenska och engelska obehindrat både i tal och skrift.


**Meriterande:**
* Tidigare konsulterfarenhet och varit i flera branscher
* Andra programmeringsspråk som t ex PHP och Go
* Relevanta utbildningar och/eller certifieringar inom området
* Erfarenhet av mjukvarutestning och testautomatisering


 VI ERBJUDER
   

  

 Här får du vara med och bygga upp något från grunden i en arbetsmiljö med högt i tak, mycket skratt och ständig utveckling. Vi erbjuder även ett gäng fantastiska kollegor som är lika taggade som du, korta beslutsvägar, och spännande projekt som sträcker sig över flera olika branscher – från Fordon, Försvar och Tillverkning till Energi, Medtech, Telekom, Retail och IT.
   

  

 Vi värdesätter balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga löner och förmåner, friskvårdsbidrag, samt möjligheter till personlig utveckling för att både kropp och knopp ska må bra.
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdag
   

  

 2025-06-30
   

  

 MER INFORMATION
   

  

 För mer information kontakta:
   

  

 Ulrika Wergens
   

  

 Sektionschef
   

  

 Sigma Industry Spark, Stockholm
   

  

 Mjukvaruutveckling
   

  

 072-522 71 05
   

  

 ulrika.wergens@sigma.se
   

  

 LinkedIn
   

  

 072-522 71 05
   

  

 ulrika.wergens@sigma.se
   

  

 LinkedIn

title: Software Engineer - Application Services
description:
10% of Europe’s CO₂ emissions are caused by residential heating and energy bills are out of control. Aira is here to change that.
   

  

 With our intelligent Aira Heat Pump at the heart, we’re making the switch to clean energy-tech easier and more affordable. Helping Europe turn off gas and slashing energy costs one home at a time.
   

  

 Founded in 2022, and with 1000+ employees and counting, Aira is driving the clean energy revolution by providing homes with modern clean energy-tech solutions such as solar power, battery storage solutions and heat pumps. With a state-of-the-art production facility in Poland, an HQ in Stockholm, Sweden, and hubs across the UK, Germany and Italy, Aira is well on track to install clean energy-tech into 5 million homes by 2034.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Join our expanding Engagement area and play a key role in the Application Services team as a Software Engineer (in-house, full-time), creating, expanding, and maintaining web and mobile apps that create an exceptional Aira experience.
   

  

 The Application Services team's focus is on creating world-class product-driven software for both our customers—end users of Aira’s green energy tech—and our internal users, such as Aira heat pump installers.
   

  

 On one hand, these apps need to be clean, easy to use and intuitive to enable effortless UX. However, at the same time, they must integrate, distribute, and efficiently manage multi-channel live data points (including IoT) and offer them internally via APIs to enable Aira product readiness in daily operations and support customers in making informed energy decisions.
   

  

 This is a Software Engineer role, back-end heavy, with front-end sense & experience needed to be involved in technical discussions to push the product development forward.
   

  

**What is the role about?**
* Writing, maintaining and enhancing clean, scalable code including thorough testing
* Using Kotlin to design, implement and maintain back-end services that serve the app and distribute the data in microservice architecture
* Building real-time streaming data pipelines and real-time streaming applications with Kafka
* Collaborating with other Aira Engagement teams (Connectivity, IoT), and implementing integrations with e.g., external energy tariffs providers and upcoming projects related to expanding Aira green tech solutions portfolio
* Demonstrating expertise in system architecture, (relational and non-relational) database design, AWS cloud operations as well as building and integrating APIs
* Actively engaging in ongoing discussions regarding design and device lifecycles
* Applying Agile methodologies and collaborating in cross-functional teams
* Optional: Contributing to the implementation of app features using Flutter, including handling user accounts, providing, and supporting integrations with Identity Providers for both installers and customers


****What are we looking for?****
* Mid to Senior profile with 5+ years of experience in Software Engineer role (back-end heavy)
* Proficiency in Kotlin, Java Spring Boot, AWS, Kafka is preferable, but we are flexible - e.g. experience in Go, Node.JS or Java for back-end is sufficient too.
* Experience in product-driven development, microservices, building & integrating APIs, system architecture, database design, and software development principles
* Right seniority and mindset to take on responsibility, and ownership and enable mission-critical discussions
* Availability and openness to work from the office - currently we aim at 4 days a week on-site model
* Front-end proficiency in Flutter, Angular is nice to have


**What's in it for you?**
* Gain hands-on experience in a fast-growing scale-up, with a supportive and inclusive culture, and career advancement opportunities.
* Collaborate with diverse teams across international markets and launch products globally.
* Develop and grow personally and professionally in an entrepreneurial-minded environment.
* Thrive in a dynamic, solution-oriented culture, tackling challenges and driving meaningful solutions that make a positive impact on the world.
* Influence the company's success, with a visible impact on product development and market growth.
* Enjoy working in our brand new office. Conveniently located near public transport, with Sankt Eriksplan subway station just a few minutes walk away.


 Aira leads in the next generation of Energy. We are driven by our belief that the power of diversity fuels innovation. We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives to join our team, united in our mission to create a better future for society and the planet.

title: Software Engineer - Backend
description:
**Do you want to join the technological revolution? Tendium is looking for a
 *Software Engineer* 
 to join the team.** 




  





*At Tendium, we build cutting-edge AI solutions that help customers make sense of complex and fragmented procurement data. As part of our AI/ML Ops team, you will be responsible for the deployment, observability, and performance of our machine learning solutions. Your work will ensure that our data processing runs reliably at scale, enabling our customers to seamlessly interact with and extract value from critical information. You will also take ownership of integrating and optimizing robust, scalable databases that support our core data workflows, from document metadata and vector embeddings to structured procurement insights.* 




  





**Why Tendium** 




 Tendium is a fast-growing tech company operating at the intersection of technology and customers. Using advanced machine-learning technologies, we are revolutionising industries with modern, efficient methods — creating new possibilities to democratise both public and private sector markets.
 



  





 Our team is expanding rapidly, bringing together some of the brightest talents from across Sweden and beyond, from data scientists to sales professionals. While we recognise the need for structure as we grow, we strive to maintain a collaborative environment where responsibility, autonomy, and individual input are highly valued.
 



  





 As Tendium grows, new opportunities emerge constantly. We’re looking for ambitious, conscientious, and value-driven colleagues to help shape the future of the business. In return, we offer a dynamic, intellectually stimulating environment where personal and professional development is prioritised. You'll have real responsibility and growth opportunities from the start.
 



  





 If you’re ready to make an impact and grow with us — we want to hear from you.
 



  





**The Job** 




 The work environment will be agile, and you’ll work alongside self-sustaining teams. Your team will have full ownership over the products and features you create, leveraging continuous delivery practices. We strive towards having development teams at Tendium that are self-reliant, comprising a spectrum of skills encompassing backend, frontend, infrastructure, and dev-ops expertise.
 



  





 As a team, we always strive to use state-of-the-art technology and stay at the forefront of development. Working agile means that we build minimum viable products, but we always aim for high-quality code. Moreover, we encourage everyone to share their thoughts and ideas, regardless of their area of expertise. We believe that great input can come from anywhere, and that includes how we work, not just what we work on. You’ll have the opportunity to shape both our product and our ways of working. And if you want to dig deep in a technical area you will always find someone interested in the team.
 



  





*We are looking for primarily* 
***Stockholm based candidates***
*and we work in a* 
***hybrid environment***
*.* 




  





**Our Current Stack** 



* Backend: NodeJS (TypeScript), GraphQL (microservice architecture),
* DBs: PostgreSQL, OpenSearch, DocumentDB (MongoDB), S3
* Infrastructure: AWS containerized and serverless compute through TypeScript CDK
* Languages: Typescript (backend and infrastructure)



  





**Who we are looking for** 




 For this position, we seek an individual who can demonstrate responsibility and initiative, as well as great attention to detail. You should value structure and possess a good ability to write scalable code at both macro and micro levels. You need to be comfortable with data modelling and have an understanding of how data decisions made upstream in a data pipeline affect end results.
 



  





 At Tendium, the tech teams work with continuous delivery and we aim for fast delivery with quality code, without over-engineering. We value constructive problem solving and are looking for someone who enjoys taking on new tasks and features and appreciates learning about and using new technology and solutions. Furthermore, we are on the lookout for individuals who find fulfillment in collaborative problem-solving and appreciate collaborating closely with team and colleagues (e.g. pair programming), and that is why we are looking for those qualities in you.
 



 Ideal candidates should have a few years of experience in backend development with a focus on data engineering.
 



  





 Note that by experience, we do not necessarily mean employment. We care about what you can do, not how long you’ve been on the payroll. We are open to ambitious candidates who have recently graduated, as long as they can demonstrate extraordinary understanding of what the role entails and how they can contribute.
 



  





**Requirements** 



* MSc Degree in computer science or similar
* 2+ years experience working with backend development.
* Proficient in SQL databases, with hands-on experience in database setup and integration.
* Experience working with Cloud storage or computing
* Based in Stockholm or surrounding areas
* Fluent in English



  





**Meritorious** 



* Proficient in TypeScript
* Experience working with large scale ML deployments.
* AWS Experience
* Wide experience in working with different AWS Storage solutions.



  





*For this role, we offer a permanent employment (Sw: tillsvidareanställning) starting with a 6-month probationary period.* 




  





**What We Offer You** 




 As part of our commitment to your overall well-being and professional growth, we are pleased to highlight some of the "soft" and social benefits you will enjoy as a member of our team:
 



  





**Exciting and Supportive Company Culture:** 
 We take pride in cultivating a vibrant and inclusive company culture that encourages collaboration, creativity, and innovation.
 



  





**Central Stockholm Location:** 
 Our office is strategically located in the heart of Stockholm.
 



  





**Breakfast at the office** 
 : All employees at the office have access to free breakfast every day.
 



  





**After Works, Parties, and Fun Activities:** 
 We are proud to promote a lively and engaging atmosphere, where we not only work hard but also take the time to celebrate our successes and cultivate strong connections among our team.
 



  





**Occupational Pension:** 
 Once you have passed your probation period, you will be enrolled in the pension scheme.
 



  





**Application** 




 We look forward to your application. We are looking to hire someone with a start date of
 **September 1st, or as close to this as possible** 
 . Successful candidates will initially be invited to a first interview where you will have the opportunity to meet the team.
 



  





 To make this process even more efficient, feel free to sign in to your Connect profile and add your references at any stage.
 



  





 Please find additional information on our recruitment process
 *here.* 




  





 If you want to know more about our culture and what you can expect when working at Tendium you can read more about it
 *here.* 




  





**Equality and inclusion statement** 




 At Tendium, we don’t just value diversity — we celebrate it. We’re building a workplace where everyone should feel that they belong, where your voice is heard, and your experiences are respected. Different perspectives fuel our creativity and drive innovation, and we’re always looking for people who can bring something new to the team. Whoever you are, wherever you're from — we’d love to hear from you. Let’s shape the future together.
 



 At Tendium we’re using data to transform public procurement, giving our clients better access to public tenders and helping governments to curb waste and enhance transparency.
 



  





 For more information contact career@tendium.com

title: C++ developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Job Description**
* Work on the game edition to develop the systems that drive Ore UI, using C++
* Collaborating with C++ developers and TypeScript/React developers on building new UI and making API decisions.
* Work with designer and producer to solve user needs.
* Maintain integration between our game and top of the line 3rd party UI technology.
* Collaborate with other teams to drive UI cohesion throughout the game.
* Improve ways of working and technical best practices within the team.
* Coach members within and outside of the team on best practices in software development.
* Balance performance, user experience and developer experience in every decision.
* Ensure high levels of quality, for example by utilizing good API design and test automation.


**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* Proficiency with C++ (C++17 and C++20).
* Experience working with legacy code.
* Understanding of and interest in rendering and how graphics implementations are made.
* Strong communication and problem-solving skills, as well as a natural collaborator and team player.
* Passion for supporting and understanding how the product teams using Ore UI can work efficiently with the framework we provide for them.


**Application deadline:** 
 28-05-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Software Engineer
job_function: Engineering, Information Technology, and Human Resources
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Software Development, and IT System Custom Software Development
description:
**Senior Fullstack/Backend Engineer | Permanent | Hybrid | Stockholm** 




  





 For our client, a SaaS company from Stockholm, we are currently looking for a Senior Fullstack/Backend Engineer who can lead technically and be a role model and/or lead others.
 



  





 You are a tech agnostic who loves building well tested and stable applications?
 



 You don't just believe “teamwork makes the dream work” but you live it?
 



 As a Developer you enjoy taking the charge and enable others around you?
 



  





 Then this opportunity might be for you!
 



  





**Your Impact** 




 You will be the bridge between business and IT work tightly with both frontend and backend developers on APIs and core functionalities, as well as build out the backbone of the platform, which is written in Ruby on Rails
 



  





**You will** 




 The goal is to have a well-tested and well-architected platform to build on for years to come and this role will have a large impact.
 



  




* **Lead with Innovation:** 
 Design, develop, and implement improvements that will be the foundation of the platform for years to come.
* **Challenge** 
 the current architecture and evolve it
* **Mentor and Inspire:** 
 Guide and coach fellow developers, sharing your expertise to elevate the entire team’s skills and best practices.
* **Drive Quality:** 
 Ensure that the platform is not only well-tested and stable but also ready to support ambitious growth plans.



  





 Your contributions will have a lasting impact on the platform’s success, helping them to deliver world-class solutions to their clients.
 



  





**What you need** 



* +5 yrs Software Engineering experience on diffrent Stacks
* Interest to work with Ruby On Rails and other languages in the future
* Exp. maintaining and improving upon large code bases
